definition: To cleanse or purify something, typically referring to the removal of dirt, impurities, or unwanted substances. It is commonly used in the context of cleaning objects, surfaces, or materials to restore their cleanliness and hygiene.

examples.english: I have to clean my car.

examples.german: Sie sollten regelmäßig Ihre Zähne reinigen.
examples.english: You should clean your teeth regularly.

examples.german: Er hat den Teppich gründlich gereinigt.
Wir müssen den Raum vor der Veranstaltung reinigen.
examples.english: We need to clean the room before the event.
